Episodes.Title: Fly, Muffin
Episodes.Plot: Muffin wants to learn to fly but it's difficult. Mr Beakman tells her to keep trying.

Episodes.Title: Bird Theatre
Episodes.Plot: Muffin wants to be in Mr Beakman's play, but there is no part for her.

Episodes.Title: A Chorus for Us
Episodes.Plot: Samuel, Muffin and Rudy each make up a silly song for the concert.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: To Play or not to Play
Episodes.Plot: Samuel and Rudy are playing, but they can't agree on what game to play.

Episodes.Title: Muffin Express
Episodes.Plot: Mr Beakman is building a train set. Muffin tries to help but she makes things worse.

Episodes.Title: The Rudy Show
Episodes.Plot: Rudy, Samuel and Muffin invite the whole town to see the Rudy Show.

Episodes.Title: Super Slide
Episodes.Plot: Samuel and Muffin ask Mrs Lovebird to fly them to the super slide, but she is too busy.

Episodes.Title: Costume Party
Episodes.Plot: Samuel wants to be an apple tree at the costume party, but Muffin eats his apple.

Episodes.Title: Meet Elliott
Episodes.Plot: Samuel and Rudy invite Muffin to a picnic with their friend Elliot.

Episodes.Title: Pogo Nest
Episodes.Plot: Quinn builds Muffin a bouncy pogo nest and warns her it will only fit one bird at a time.

Episodes.Title: Samuel's Dance
Episodes.Plot: Everyone practises a dance for the big dance party, but Samuel can't find his rhythm.

Episodes.Title: Rolling Along
Episodes.Plot: Mrs Lovebird asks Samuel and Rudy to watch Muffin as she plays in her toy nest-car.

Episodes.Title: Perfect Picnic
Episodes.Plot: Samuel, Muffin and Rudy are going on a picnic and Samuel insists that it be perfect.

Episodes.Title: Pie Fair
Episodes.Plot: Rudy pushes the pie-making machine's forbidden red button and it goes berserk.

Episodes.Title: Muffin's Shop
Episodes.Plot: Muffin hops around the community, innocently taking things that do not belong to her.

Episodes.Title: Dinosaur
Episodes.Plot: Samuel and Rudy build Muffin a giant papier-mache dinosaur for Muffin.

Episodes.Title: Go Camping
Episodes.Plot: Rudy and Samuel show Muffin the joys of camping.

Episodes.Title: Starry Night
Episodes.Plot: The group helps Mrs Billingsley up a hill in time to see the lovely meteor shower.

Episodes.Title: Amazing Muffin
Episodes.Plot: Mr Beakman and Muffin decide to put on a magic show together.

Episodes.Title: Ice Skating
Episodes.Plot: Samuel, Muffin and Rudy head over to frozen Branch Lake with Mr Beakman for ice-skating.

Episodes.Title: Playhouse
Episodes.Plot: When Samuel and Rudy won't let Muffin into their playhouse, she decides to build her own.

Episodes.Title: Cowgirl
Episodes.Plot: The kids help Muffin dress up as a cowgirl.

Episodes.Title: Muffin's Plant
Episodes.Plot: Muffin finds a strange plant, but it smells so terrible that no one wants it in the tree.

Episodes.Title: Baby Jordan
Episodes.Plot: Mr Beakman's three-year-old nephew Jordan comes to visit, but Muffin is not happy about it.
